name: Business Development Officer
description:
We create iGaming products that are used daily by thousands of people. Now we are over 100 people and constantly growing. We are currently looking for a Business Development Officer to help us to expand our business and launch our b2b platform.

Your responsibilities will include:

  • Explore commercial capacity, market trends, and particular segments' needs

  • Development of an entry strategy for new regions (Southeast Asia, Africa, Europe)

  • Negotiations with prospective customers and partners

  • Compose Value Proposition for clients

  • Sales and negotiations

  • Expand the partners' base

Must-have skills:

  • Experience in iGaming companies

  • Working proficiency in English

  • Results-oriented approach

  • Excellent negotiation skills

  • Ability to conduct presentations and negotiations

  • Personal selling experience

  • High education (technical or economic field)

It would be an advantage:

  • People management experience

What we can offer:

  • Work format: hybrid format, the flexible start of the working day, flexible vacation and sick leave policy
  • Payment: fix salary with monthly bonuses
  • Employment: direct permanent contract
  • Growth: everyone has the opportunity for fast growth; we have a budget for education
  • Moreover: work equipment and English classes
